name: discord-to-obsidian
description: Application web pour connecter Discord à Obsidian

scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
